## Enable Enhanced Contextual Knowledge

```env
# Enable enhanced contextual understanding
CTX_KNOWLEDGE_ENABLED=true

# Use OpenRouter with Claude for best results + 90% cost savings via caching
TEXT_PROVIDER=openrouter
TEXT_MODEL=anthropic/claude-3.5-sonnet
OPENROUTER_API_KEY=your-openrouter-api-key
```

## API Key Configuration

```env
OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-...
ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=sk-ant-...
OPENROUTER_API_KEY=sk-or-...
GOOGLE_API_KEY=your-key
```

## Text Generation Configuration for Contextual Mode

```env
TEXT_PROVIDER=openrouter           # openai | anthropic | openrouter | google
TEXT_MODEL=anthropic/claude-3.5-sonnet
```

## Custom Embedding Configuration

```env
# Only needed if you're not using a standard AI plugin
EMBEDDING_PROVIDER=openai          # openai | google
TEXT_EMBEDDING_MODEL=text-embedding-3-small
EMBEDDING_DIMENSION=1536           # Vector dimension
```

## Programmatic Knowledge Management (TypeScript)

```typescript
import { KnowledgeService } from '@elizaos/plugin-knowledge';

// Add knowledge programmatically
const result = await knowledgeService.addKnowledge({
  clientDocumentId: 'unique-doc-id',
  content: documentContent, // Base64 for PDFs, plain text for others
  contentType: 'application/pdf',
  originalFilename: 'document.pdf',
  worldId: runtime.worldId,
  roomId: runtime.roomId,
  entityId: runtime.entityId,
  metadata: {
    // Optional
    source: 'upload',
    author: 'John Doe',
  },
});

// Search knowledge
const searchResults = await knowledgeService.searchKnowledge({
  query: 'quantum computing',
  agentId: runtime.agentId,
  limit: 10,
});
```

## Configure Performance Tuning (.env)

```env
MAX_CONCURRENT_REQUESTS=30         # Parallel processing limit
REQUESTS_PER_MINUTE=60             # Rate limiting
TOKENS_PER_MINUTE=150000           # Token rate limiting
MAX_INPUT_TOKENS=4000              # Chunk size limit
MAX_OUTPUT_TOKENS=4096             # Response size limit
```

## Custom Document Loading Path

```env
# Custom document path (default: ./docs)
KNOWLEDGE_PATH=/custom/path
```

## Configure Automatic Document Loading

```env
# Create a 'docs' folder in your project root
# Example directory structure:
# your-project/
# ├── .env
# ├── docs/           ← Create this folder
# │   ├── guide.pdf
# │   ├── manual.txt
# │   └── notes.md
# └── package.json

# Set this variable in your .env file to true
LOAD_DOCS_ON_STARTUP=true
```

## Add Knowledge Plugin to Agent Configuration

```typescript
import {
  Agent,
  AgentManager,
  DefaultAgentManager,
} from '@elizaos/core';

// In your character file (e.g., character.ts)
export const character = {
  name: 'MyAgent',
  plugins: [
    '@elizaos/plugin-openai', // ← Make sure you have this
    '@elizaos/plugin-knowledge', // ← Add this line
    // ... your other plugins
  ],
  // ... rest of your character config
};

// Example of how an agent might be initialized (not part of the plugin itself)
async function initializeAgent() {
  const agentManager: AgentManager = new DefaultAgentManager();
  const agent: Agent = await agentManager.createAgent(character);
  console.log(`Agent ${agent.name} initialized with Knowledge plugin.`);
}

initializeAgent();
```
